acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Botetourt County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: McKnight and Wilson a mercantile business selling shoes and leather and repairing shoes that conducted business in the town of Buchanan in Botetourt County during the mid-nineteenth century.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: McKnight and Galbraith Account Book, 1836-1846, contains information related to a leather and shoe-making business. It records the individual accounts of customers. Each account lists transactions in chronological order, items purchased or services provided, and the amount owed and paid. No index.
